name: TrustCapital
overview:
The Trust Group comprises of Trust Capital Services (India) Private Limited, Trust Financial Consultancy Services Private Limited and Trust Investment Advisory Private Limited.

Trust Capital Services (India) Private Limited (TCS) is the flagship company and commenced operations in the year 2000. Over the years, TCS has consolidated its leadership in the Indian fixed income market by providing intermediation services to banks, institutions, mutual funds, co-operative banks, provident funds and charitable trust, among others.

Incorporated in 2003, Trust Financial Consultancy Services Private Limited (TFCS) is a member of the Wholesale Debt Market segment of National Stock Exchange.

Trust Investment Advisory Private Limited (TIAP), a 100% subsidiary of TCS was incorporated in 2006. TIAP is a SEBI (Securities Exchange Board of India) registered Portfolio Manager and Merchant Banker.
